title: Cats and Their Diet
text: Cats generally eat small animals, such as mice, or specially prepared cat food.

title: Animals That Eat Rodents
text: Various animals like cats and owls hunt small rodents like mice and rats.

title: Principles of Flight
text: Airplanes fly by generating lift, which is created by the flow of air over the wings.

title: Paris, the Capital of France
text: Paris is the capital and largest city of France, known for its culture and history.

title: Understanding Photosynthesis
text: Photosynthesis is the process by which plants convert sunlight into chemical energy.

title: Benefits of Yoga
text: Yoga offers numerous health benefits, including improved flexibility, strength, and stress reduction.

title: Cooking the Perfect Steak
text: The perfect steak is cooked by searing it at high temperature and then letting it rest to retain juices.
